QuestData.Title: Barrier Buster
QuestData.Description:
Oy, $n! I think I might have a solution te that pesky barrier keepin ye out of Corlain proper!
I took the silver we had left 'ere an' doctored up one o' these cannonballs. The walls surroundin' Corlain are festooned with defensive cannons. Get one pointed at the gate, ye can send this beauty right into the barrier!
Ye'll need a hefty pinch of powder te get this thing movin', though - it's a bit on the heavy side. Ye can likely find some in the camp outside the walls.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Blasting Powder from Pikeman's Ridge and bring them to Inquisitor Sterntide outside the gate into Upper Corlain.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Blasting Powder to Inquisitor Sterntide in Upper Corlain.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't think these guys will be needin' this cannon anymore.
QuestData.RewardText:
Quite a bit of powder ya got there.
Careful ya don't take the whole wall down.
